summary: Can you do a piece where Harry and y/n are acquaintances and she has feelings for him but he gets a long time gf so y/n decides...
question: Can you do a piece where Harry and y/n are acquaintances and she has feelings for him but he gets a long time gf so y/n decides to ‘move on’ and falls for someone else but then harry breaks up with his gf and y/n is conflicted pleaseee? You decide who she chooses🙀 xx
answer:
You always had a crush on Harry. I mean who wouldn’t?
Your parents were friends with Anne, you’ve known the Styles family since forever and Harry had always been a good friend, when you guys saw each other. That little crush had quickly changed when you got into that certain age where boys weren’t just boys but became more interesting and there you found yourself being head over heels in love with Harry Styles who soon became a huge superstar, traveling the whole world.
You had always been in contact and in between the hiatus of his band One Direction and the start of his solo career the two of you again spend more time with each other, as he was in England again. You saw each other every few weeks for dinner or just for something to drink.
You never were one of the girls who would just take what she wants. You were one of those girl who would wait for the boy to do the first move. That didn’t seem to work with Harry. He was always very polite, also flirty on some days but he never made one step further and so you just enjoyed spending time with him - in that moment you were totally fine with it.
Until he met his new girlfriend. A tall, blonde, perfect model. It broke your heart deep down. You knew you had missed your chance, the chance of Harry finally being more than just someone you would have dinner now and than, Harry finally being more than just a acquaintance.
As soon as Harry got his girlfriend the two of you stopped seeing each other. He had more to do with his own work, and his girlfriend also took a lot of time, and you decided to not bother him anymore. 

After a few months you met someone very special. Brad. He was funny, he was nice and he looked damn good. You fell in love, head over heels just like you did with Harry. But this time you didn’t miss your chance and shortly after Brad became your boyfriend. You very the happiest you had been in such a long time. You felt so safe around him, so comfortable and loved. And you really did love him as well. It was the first boy you really had a relationship with, not just a crush. You really loved him and soon you forgot about Harry and the crush you have had.
It wasn’t until that one night he stood in front of your door, in the middle of the night. You had just come home from a night with your girlfriends, your boyfriend already in bed when he texted you saying he was outside.
Never in a million years you thought he would just show up, you always imagined seeing him at a fancy restaurant or something like that. 

“What are you doing here?”, you asked after your opened the door with a light smile on your face. But that smile disappeared as soon as you looked into his eyes. They were puffy and red - he had cried.
“What’s wrong?”, you asked confused and full of worry. You had never seen Harry like this before.
“It’s - I broke up with her.”, he stumbled. You felt bad, you felt so bad and wanted to shove him inside, but you were afraid of Brad waking up to you and Harry in the living room so you stepped outside and shut the door behind you, after grabbing your keys.
“What happened?”, you asked, still confused.
“I just don’t love her. I never really had. In the beginning I had feelings - she’s a great girl. But she’s just not the one. I guess I’m just not able to actually love and being in a relationship.”, he said, then running a hand over his face.
You felt bad, you felt so sorry for him. Even though you hadn’t seen each other quite a bit, you still cared for him and you didn’t wanted to see him like that.
“Don’t say that. You’ll find someone, you’ll find the one Harry. I always thought I would be alone until the day I die and now look at me.”, you chuckled. “You’ll find someone great.”, you said.
Harry sighted. “I should have never let you go.”
You didn’t know what to say and at first you didn’t really understand what he meant.
“What?”, you asked. “I had a crush on you Y/n. I mean I still have. All the time but I thought this would never work out, that you probably never wanted to be with me, like as my girlfriend.”, he said. You swallowed hard, your cheeks getting red.
“Well I thought the same about you.”, you said after a moment.
“You thought.”, Harry said more to himself than to you.
“Look Harry - Brad’s a great guy, I’m really happy with him and - I’m sorry.”, you said quietly. Harry nodded. “I know - I know.”, then he ran a hand through his hair. “I’m sorry - I shouln’t have come in the first place.”, he said and was about to take off.
“Harry wait. I don’t want to not see you again for like another 5 months. I care about you and I want us to be friends again.”
It was like Harrys jaw tightened at the word friends but he nodded. “Okay.”, he said quietly. “I’ll text you.”, he said, then he was gone and there you were thinking about if you once again made the wrong choice or if it was the right way just following your guts.



Hope you like it xx

masterlist

Hope you like it xx

body:

Chapter 1: Alien abduction and Hogwarts

title: Turquoise
body:

“So… are we all done with being little bitches, boys?” Louis Tomlinson asked, surveying the three other men standing near him on the studio stage. He shot a stern look in Harry’s direction….

summary: i love that we’re at the point where i can see a photo of harry wearing black trousers, a white tank top, and a sparkly mermaid...
body: i love that we’re at the point where i can see a photo of harry wearing black trousers, a white tank top, and a sparkly mermaid colored jacket and honestly think “oh wow an understated look tonight” like i stan such an extra lil demon

reblog.comment: i love that we’re at the point where i can see a photo of harry wearing black trousers, a white tank top, and a sparkly mermaid colored jacket and honestly think “oh wow an understated look tonight” like i stan such an extra lil demon

summary: This chapter was amazing!! It's something I haven't seen written before. And I'm so happy for Alfred and Jude! (Pretty anxious...
question: This chapter was amazing!! It's something I haven't seen written before. And I'm so happy for Alfred and Jude! (Pretty anxious about what happens next with Harry and Car 😩😩😩)
answer: I’m so glad you liked it, anon! More to come soon, lovely…. xx

reblog.comment: I’m so glad you liked it, anon! More to come soon, lovely…. xx

trail.content_raw: I’m so glad you liked it, anon! More to come soon, lovely…. xx
trail.content: I’m so glad you liked it, anon! More to come soon, lovely…. xx

title: College Crushing
body:
College has never been more complicated

Chapter Ten

I figured out in high school that I had a tendency to push guys away once I knew they liked me, even if I liked them back. I still don’t know how I ended up dating someone in high school, he must…

Read more…
